trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_location" name="location" href=""></xref> element within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en <xref uid="langword_csharp_location" name="location" href=""> </xref> element i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the ConfigurationLocation class represents a single `location` element within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av klassen ConfigurationLocation representerer én `location` element i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: Locations are used to specify configuration settings that apply only to a specified resource, such as a specific page, file, or subdirectory, within your Web application.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til å angi innstillinger som gjelder bare for en angitt ressurs, for eksempel en bestemt side, fil eller undermappe i webprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationLocation class to obtain the path and the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration> object that applies to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ConfigurationLocation-klasse for å hente banen og <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>objekt som gjelder for den angitte ressursen.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a Configuration object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en konfigurasjonsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative path to the resource whose configuration settings are represented by this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter relativ bane for ressursen der konfigurasjonsinnstillingene representeres av dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The path that is returned by the Path property is relative to the root of your Web site.
trans-unit.target: Banen som returneres av Path-egenskapen er viser til webområdet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Path property might contain a comma-delimited list of paths to which the configuration setting applies.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Path-egenskapen kan inneholde en kommadelt liste over baner som konfigurasjonsinnstillingen for gjelder.

trans-unit.source: The relative path to the resource whose configuration settings are represented by this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Relativ bane for ressursen der konfigurasjonsinnstillingene representeres av dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation"> </xref>.
